column1: Nala was in her room ready to sleep. Nala wants to have a good night's sleep without any nightmares. The door to Nala's room is locked. A purple butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Nala sees the purple butterfly.
Hugo was in the park with his friends. Hugo wanted to win the kite flying contest. The string of Hugo's kite was strong. A squirrel runs by with a nut in its mouth. Hugo sees the squirrel.
Ravi was at the fish market. Ravi wanted to buy a fish for his mom to cook for dinner. The fish on the scale was heavy. A scared cat runs through the fish market. Ravi sees the scared cat.
Vito was at a birthday party. Vito wanted to give his friend a special gift. The gift was wrapped in a shiny paper. A clown comes into the room to perform a magic show. Vito sees the clown.
Tim was in the kitchen, ready to make lunch. Tim wanted to make a big bowl of pasta. The pasta box was full. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Tim sees the bird.
Wendy was in the park, sitting on a bench. Wendy wanted to play a charming tune on her small flute. The flute was in her bag. A squirrel runs up a tree nearby. Wendy sees the squirrel.
Gigi was at the park with her friends. Gigi wanted to share her mints with her friends. The mint box was full of fat, healthy mints. A rainbow appears in the sky. Gigi sees the rainbow.

Remy was in the park playing with his colorful parrot. Remy wanted his parrot to learn a new trick. The parrot was sitting on a clear and open branch. A squirrel runs across the park. Remy sees the squirrel running.
column2: the branch the parrot is sitting on

column1: Pete was at the park, ready to eat his lunch. Pete wanted to enjoy his food while watching the birds. The food in Pete's lunch box was fresh and yummy. A patient dog sits down next to Pete, watching him. Pete sees the patient dog.
Quin was in the park with his gray paint and brush. Quin wanted to paint a big tree on a big balloon. The balloon was empty. A squirrel runs past Quin, carrying a nut. Quin sees the squirrel.

Yara was at a party with her friends. Yara wanted to sing her favorite song for everyone. The microphone was working fine. A dog runs into the party and starts to play with the balloons. Yara sees the dog playing with the balloons.

Sam was at the space station, waiting to travel back to Earth. Sam wants to return home to see his family. The spaceship's launch schedule was synchronized with Earth's rotation. A shooting star passes by the space station. Sam sees the shooting star.
Ina was at the park, sitting on a gray bench. Ina wanted to solve the puzzle in her story book. The puzzle in the story book was hard. A squirrel runs across the park. Ina sees the squirrel.

Lenny was at the market to buy a smelly cheese. Lenny wanted to find the best smelly cheese for his mom. The cheese was very expensive. A juggler starts performing in the middle of the market. Lenny sees the juggler.

Kip was at the mall looking at a beautiful painting. Kip wanted to buy the painting to put it in his room. The painting was very expensive. A clown starts to make balloon animals near the painting. Kip sees the clown making balloon animals.

Jake was in the kitchen ready to make dinner. Jake wanted to make a big salad with all the fresh groceries he bought. The knife he uses to cut veggies was very sharp. A reliable old friend calls Jake on the phone. Jake hears the phone ringing.

Yara was in the kitchen making a sandwich. Yara wanted to find the peanut butter in the cupboard to spread on her bread. The cupboard door was flat and straight. A parrot flies into the kitchen through the open window. Yara sees the parrot.

Dora was at the library looking for a fun book to read. Dora wants to find a book that will make her laugh. The book Dora wants is on the top shelf. The lights in the library start to glow brighter. Dora notices the lights glowing brighter.

Xander was in the forest, looking for deer. Xander wanted to find a deer to take a picture. The deer was hidden in the bushes. A comfortable breeze blows through the forest. Xander feels the comfortable breeze.

Remy was at the park playing with his toy car. Remy wants to stay at the park until the sun goes down. The toy car was fully charged. A flock of birds suddenly flies over the park. Remy sees the flock of birds.

Ed was at the airport waiting for his flight. Ed wanted to finish his book before his flight. The bottle of water Ed had was full. A weird noise sounds from the airport speakers. Ed hears the weird noise.

Caden was at the park playing with his friends. Caden wanted to show his friends his new toy lizard. The toy lizard was clean and shiny. A butterfly lands on a flower near Caden. Caden sees the butterfly.

Tilly was in the park, sitting on a bench. Tilly wanted to feed the humble rat that visited her every day. The rat was in its hole, not coming out. A group of children start playing football near the bench. Tilly sees the children playing football.

Fergus was at the park playing fetch with his dog. Fergus wants to get his dog to fetch a long stick. The stick was lying on the ground. A squirrel scurries up a tree nearby. Fergus sees the squirrel.

Gabe was at the park with his lovely new cart. Gabe wanted to decorate his cart with shiny stickers. The cart was clean and ready for decoration. A squirrel scurries up a nearby tree. Gabe sees the squirrel.

Darius was in his art class, drawing his favorite tree. Darius wanted to make his tree look real with brown ink. The ink bottle on Darius's table was full. A gust of wind blows Darius's drawing off the table. Darius sees his drawing being blown off the table.
Kiki was at the beach with her metal detector. Kiki wanted to collect any gold she could find. The sand was cool and undisturbed. A seagull lands near Kiki. Kiki sees the seagull.

Xander was in the kitchen making breakfast. Xander wanted to make a good omelette for his mom. The egg in the pan was not cooked yet. A small cactus on the window sill falls over. Xander sees the cactus fall over.

Yara was at a factory on a tour with her school friends. Yara wants to learn about how ice cream is made. The ice cream mix in the big vat was thick and creamy. A factory worker drops a box of ice cream cones. Yara sees the factory worker drop the box of cones.
column2: ice cream mix in the vat

column1: Sam was in the kitchen making a cake. Sam wanted to wash his hands before he started to bake. The sink in the kitchen was clean. A fair, golden cat walks into the kitchen. Sam sees the golden cat.

Adam was in his lab working on his science project. Adam wanted to finish his project before the end of the day. The lab clock was synchronized with the school's main clock. A bird flies into the lab through an open window. Adam sees the bird.

Ollie was in the kitchen ready to make dinner. Ollie wanted to cut some veggies for a fine soup. The knife was sharp and ready to use. A song about a journey starts playing on the radio. Ollie hears the song about a journey.
Benny was at the park near the harmless creek. Benny wanted to sing a new song he just learned. The creek was quiet and restful. A red kite gets stuck in a tree near Benny. Benny sees the red kite.

Lenny was in a subway station waiting for his train. Lenny wanted to share his lunch with a friend who was also taking the subway. The tracks for the subway were aligned. A wealthy businessman drops a coin on the platform. Lenny sees the businessman drop a coin.

Xander was in the park playing a game of knights with his friends. Xander wanted to be the best knight and protect his friends with his shield. The shield Xander was using was made of cardboard and was originally opaque. A dog runs past the children playing the game. Xander sees the dog running past.

Noah was at a busy coffee shop waiting for his friend. Noah wanted to buy a coffee and sit with his friend. The coffee machine was working well. A street musician starts playing a song outside the coffee shop. Noah hears the street musician playing a song.

Yesterday, Yara was playing with her favorite toy car in the kitchen. She wanted to make the car do a big jump over the sink. The drain in the sink was closed. A bird chirps loudly outside the window. Yara hears the bird chirping.
Vito was at a park, watching the birds. Vito wanted to sit on the park bench and enjoy his lunch. The bench was dry and clean. A heart-shaped leaf falls from a tree. Vito sees the heart-shaped leaf.

Dan was in the park for his morning jog. Dan wanted to finish his jog and pick some fresh radishes from the park's garden. The ice cream cone sitting on the park bench was solid. A cool breeze starts blowing in the park. Dan feels the cool breeze.
column2: ice cream cone on the park bench

column1: Finn was at the beach, ready for a swim. Finn wanted to swim in the sea where the popular shark named "Bubbles" was known to play. The shark cage was open. A seagull steals Finn's sandwich from his picnic basket. Finn sees the seagull stealing his sandwich.
Hana was at the park playing with her kite. Hana wants to fly her kite high up in the sky. The cable on Hana's kite is tied tightly. A hot air balloon passes by. Hana sees the hot air balloon.

Max was at the park ready to play. Max wanted to play a fun game of hide and seek. The rag he used as a marker was neatly folded on the bench. A shy squirrel scurries across the park. Max sees the shy squirrel.

Uri was in the music room at school. Uri wanted to play a harmless prank on his friend. The piano in the music room was light. A bird flies into the music room through an open window. Uri sees the bird.
Yara was at a park playing with her green ball. Yara wanted to play catch with her dad. The ball was very bouncy. A squirrel runs across the park. Yara sees the squirrel running across the park.

Tia was at the park playing with her toy cart. Tia wanted to push her cart down the hill and watch it roll. The cart's wheels were tight and good for rolling. A squirrel runs up a nearby tree. Tia sees the squirrel.

Val was in the kitchen getting ready for a party. Val wanted to make a cold drink for her friends. The metal tie she used to wrap the ice was cold and conductive. A cat jumps onto the kitchen counter. Val sees the cat jumping onto the kitchen counter.

Flora was in her classroom, waiting for her friends to play a game. Flora wanted to play a game of twist-the-bottle. The cap on the bottle was twisted tight. A cold breeze blows into the classroom from the open window. Flora feels the cold breeze.

Gus was at the park drawing pictures with his crayons. Gus wanted to draw a big, beautiful rainbow. The box of crayons was full of many colors. A gentle breeze blows through the park, rustling the leaves. Gus feels the gentle breeze.

Gabe was at the park playing with his toy magnet. Gabe wanted to show his friends how his toy magnet could pick up small metal pieces. The toy magnet was very strong. A squirrel runs across the park. Gabe sees the squirrel.
